CodeList.Name: Genetic Region of Interest Type

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the classification of the genetic region under study.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function. (NCI)
A variety of simple 2-5 base pair repeats (e.g., T-A repeats, variable number of tandem repeats (VNTRs), etc.) present within most chromosomes. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Genetic Region of Interest Type Terminology
